General.Name: HighGold Mining Inc
General.Description: HighGold Mining Inc. operates as a gold exploration company in Canada. It also explores for copper, zinc, silver, and lead, as well as other base metals. The company's flagship asset is the Johnson Tract gold property covering an area of 84.75 square kilometers located in Southcentral Alaska, the United States. The company also holds 100% interest in Munro-Croesus property covering an area of 63 square kilometers located in Matheson, Ontario, Canada; and Golden Mile property covering an area of 94 square kilometers, and the Timmins South project covering an area of 102 square kilometers located in Timmins, Ontario, Canada. In addition, it holds 100% interest in the Yukon property comprising 1,023 claims covering an area of 210 square kilometers located in Selwyn Basin, Yukon Territory. The company was incorporated in 2019 and is headquartered in Vancouver, Canada.
General.Address: 800 West Pender Street, Vancouver, BC, Canada, V6C 2V6
